Html:
Hello, hmmm, I'm new here, trying to understand de goblin's tutorials, so I tryied to create a new Goblin project, and walk with the camera...

But i have no idea, of how to do it, do you guys have another documentation or help guide you can tell me xD?

 

please.

 

Thanks

Hi,

Im a beginner to Goblin XNA too and I would suggest to follow the Installation Guide to build Goblin XNA and then try out the samples included in Goblin. Compared to other AR libraries I find Goblin Helpful. Im not a expert on this but I would be able to help if needed. 

Regards,

Janidu.

P.S I did not find any helpful tutorials in the internet on Goblin other than what I found here.
